oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The relations of wind, moon, and cloud to human beings after death, etc. (L V.-15. 5147-5158). What happens when the |xam die. 1) p.5146v: this story was told to Dia!kwain by his mother (=kamme-an) and father (Xaa-ttin) and he also saw it for himself, 2) pp.5149v & 5150v: see Sitting in the shade, 3) p.5150v: Dia!kwain's mother heard the part of the story about death from her mother, 4) This story is found in Book V-15.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What happens when we die
